attributes.action: Theresa May must be replaced as Prime Minister. She can't handle Brexit.
attributes.background: Mrs May has been unable to deal with the EU in an effective manner, and she is slowly giving in to pure extortion from the EU over the Brexit bill. She must be replaced by a PM who believes in Brexit and who will be willing to stop negotiations if the EU refuses to compromise.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked.
